verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: boston] [ARG2: out of the running for amazon] hq2 amazon is reportedly closing in on a decision on where to locate its new second headquarters and it appears boston may be out of the running according to a wall street journal report over the weekend amazon boston globe crystal city boston amazon marty walsh massachusetts wall street journal new york
